most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service

common_issues.title: PiecesOS 11.0.4 Windows App Launch Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing problems with the Pieces desktop app on Windows after updating to PiecesOS 11.0.4. Issues include an error message stating 'Connection closed before full header was received' and a non-dismissable overlay message.  Troubleshooting steps include providing support logs, confirming consistent error occurrence, and providing system information.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Copilot Service
related_issues.text:

Current Version: "Windows 10 Home Single Language" 10.0 (Build 26100)
Min Version Supported: Windows 10 Build 1903
## GitHub Issue Summary: Unable to Download Local LLMs

**Key Points:**

* User @AmanSingh766 reported an issue where they were unable to download local LLMs in Pieces Copilot Service.
* The error message was "Connection closed before full header was received."

**Problems Identified:**

* Difficulty downloading local LLMs.
* User unable to utilize downloaded LLMs effectively.

**Proposed/Implemented Solutions:**

* Pieces support representative requested user to provide support logs and confirm if the error occurred every time.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* Issue pending further investigation based on user response. 
* Resolution remains open until the information is provided.

related_issues.title: Non-dismissable overlay message.
related_issues.text:
Non-dismissable overlay message.
### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

v11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

My Pieces app launches at Windows startup (intended). Sometimes, (possibly after a background update?), this dialog appears on my desktop. I don't know what it means, exactly, but I cannot click "Ok" and there is no other way to dismiss it. My only option appears to be to restart the computer, which is often impractical. Please fix!

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f231ef56-3d59-4e94-8cb5-2b54249900cc)
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key points raised:**

* User `ThemePark` is having trouble launching the Pieces Windows desktop app.
* This issue appears after the latest PiecesOS 11.0 release.

**Problems identified:**

* The user is unable to open the Pieces app.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* Pieces support team routed the issue to the appropriate member.
* Suggested related issues and resources for the user to explore.
* Support team member `mack-at-pieces` requested further information:
    * User's Windows version
    * Confirmation of PiecesOS and Pieces Desktop installation

**Current status/outcome:**

* Support team member engaged, further information required for diagnosis.

**Additional notes:**

* The issue conversation starts on January 17, 2025, and ends on the same day with the last comment from `mack-at-pieces`.

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the 'Connection closed before full header was received' error message in PiecesOS 11.0.4 for Windows.
Address the non-dismissable overlay message bug in the Pieces desktop app for Windows.
Provide clearer guidance to users on how to troubleshoot PiecesOS 11.0.4 Windows app launch issues.
Consider increasing support staff or re-allocating resources to handle the influx of support tickets related to PiecesOS 11.0.4 for Windows.
Improve communication with users regarding the status of these known issues and expected resolution timelines.
